topComments.author: Azalia Roach
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) A atmosfera n√£o √© o que eu esperava. Muitos dos jogos s√£o antigos/desatualizados, fora de ordem, bot√µes do guitar hero n√£o funcionam, meu kart desacelerou, jogos virtuais com dificuldades t√©cnicas, trabalhadores andando e se movendo com zero senso de urg√™ncia. Pelo menos os poucos passeios/jogos virtuais que eu e meus irm√£os jogamos foram divertidos. Literalmente deveria ter ido com a minha primeira mente e ido ao Xtreme Action Park como sempre fa√ßo.  (Original) The atmosphere is NOT what I expected. Many of the games are old/outdated, out of order, buttons on the guitar hero don‚Äôt work, slowed down my go kart, virtual games having technical difficulties, workers walking and moving with zero sense of urgency. At least the few virtual rides/games my brothers and I played were fun. Literally should‚Äôve went with my first mind and went to Xtreme Action Park like I always do.

topComments.author: Joerell Valdes
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Esta foi a primeira vez que venho aqui e tenho que admitir que n√£o sei como n√£o estive aqui antes! Tem de tudo, desde karts a minigolfe, escalada, pista de obst√°culos e parque de trampolim, o atendimento ao cliente era incr√≠vel, os banheiros eram limpos e o lugar tinha uma boa atmosfera para trazer seus filhos para se divertirem. Eu sou um gerente geral e com certeza consideraria conseguir um emprego neste lugar s√≥ por causa da divers√£o e da felicidade de todos. Parece um √≥timo lugar para trabalhar e uma √≥tima atmosfera. Voc√™ n√£o vai errar ao trazer seus filhos aqui para ter divirta-se, v√° e verifique-os !!! üôåüíØ  (Original) This was my first time ever coming here and I have to admit I don't know how I haven't been here before! Have everything from go-karts to mini golfing to rock climbing to a obstacle course and trampoline park the customer service was amazing bathrooms were clean and the place was all around a good atmosphere to bring your kids to have fun. I am a general manager and would definitely even consider getting a job at this place just because of how fun and how happy everybody was it looks like a great place to work and a great atmosphere you won't go wrong bringing your kids here to have fun go and check them out!!!üôåüíØ

topComments.author: Ina Flash
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Em geral, as crian√ßas se divertiram. Mas como um adulto - voc√™ pode ver que a equipe √© pregui√ßosa e n√£o quer tornar a experi√™ncia agrad√°vel. Os fliperamas est√£o desatualizados, muitos n√£o funcionam ou nem est√£o ligados. A zona de salto constantemente tem se√ß√µes fechadas (mas voc√™ paga o pre√ßo total do ingresso).  O que √© mais preocupante - √© que a equipe n√£o garante que as crian√ßas mais velhas n√£o estejam pulando nos pequenos. Algu√©m sempre se machuca! E voc√™ assina um formul√°rio dizendo que eles n√£o s√£o respons√°veis. Ent√£o, se voc√™ levar as crian√ßas aqui - observe-as!!!  (Original) In general, the kids had fun. But as an adult - you can see that the staff is lazy and don't want to make the experience pleasant. The arcades are outdated, many don't work or aren't even turned on. The jumping zone constantly has sections closed off (but you pay full ticket price).  What's most concerning - is that the staff doesn't make sure that older kids aren't jumping on the little ones. Someone always gets hurt! And you sign a form saying they're not liable. So if you take the kids here - watch them!!!

topComments.author: yarivey montoro
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Tivemos o tempo mais maravilhoso neste parque. Tudo √© super limpo. A equipe, embora a maioria deles seja muito jovem, eles foram super simp√°ticos, educados e eficientes. At√© a comida estava boa! Eles se esfor√ßaram em v√°rias ocasi√µes para acomodar nossos numerosos grupos em todas as atividades que quer√≠amos fazer. Nossos filhos se divertiram muito! A equipe de gest√£o (Jen Hillmon e Anthony Johnson) est√° fazendo um √≥timo trabalho!  (Original) We had the most wonderful time at this park. Everything is super clean. The staff even though most of them are very young, they were super nice, polite, and efficient. Even the food was good! They went out of their way in various occasions to accommodate our numerous groups in all the activities we wanted to do. Our kids had a blast! The management team (Jen Hillmon and Anthony Johnson) is doing a great job!

topComments.author: Marina H
topComments.comment: This place had a great potential when it opened a few years ago. Unfortunately, that potential has never manifested. I took my kids there yesterday, the trampoline park area was dirty, especially around the shoe storage shelves, smelled really sour, the staff attitude was "I cannot care less", half of the arcade machines were broken, the drinks were awful quality and overpriced. And, on top of that our kid's Nikes were stolen while he was playing at the trampoline park, so he had to walk back without shoes.

topComments.author: Laura L
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Este lugar √© igualmente divertido para crian√ßas e adultos. Eu n√£o posso acreditar que tantas pessoas n√£o ouviram falar deste lugar! H√° muito espa√ßo para melhorias, mas, no geral, √© um lugar divertido e seguro.  (Original) This place is equally fun for childen and adults alike. I can't believe so many folks haven't heard of this place!  There is lots of room for improvement but, overall it's a fun and safe place.

topComments.author: Ilona Nesterova (ILONA_TRAVELONA)
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) A maior √°rea de entretenimento do norte de Miami. Festas, karting, sala de selfies, patins, trampolins de salto e muito mais. Somos aben√ßoados por ter este lugar legal. Ir√° visitar nas f√©rias.  (Original) The biggest entertainment area in North Miami. Parties, carting, selfie room, roller skating, jumping trampolines and much more. We are blessed to have this cool spot. Will visit on vacations.

topComments.author: Caro
topComments.comment: Super fun, so much to do for all ages; I love how affordable Dezerland is, a $20 game card will buy hours in the arcade, you can play every single game and more with only $20. Facilities are clean, good amount of staff on hand. I love how they update new areas such as a skating rink and billiards hall! Always something new when i we visit. Looking forward to going back and bringing our friends and family!

topComments.author: Darinda Reyes
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) A ger√™ncia e os funcion√°rios foram muito simp√°ticos. Os karts Go s√£o super divertidos. As instala√ß√µes s√£o limpas. Jogos de arcade e atra√ß√µes VR s√£o bons. Alguns dos jogos de arcade n√£o estavam funcionando. Houve um pouco de confus√£o de onde ir para comprar cart√µes e ingressos, depois ativ√°-los. A comida √© um pouco cara, mas por√ß√µes decentes. Agora que entendemos melhor como as coisas funcionam, voltaremos.  (Original) Management and staff were very friendly. The Go karts are super fun. Facilities are clean. Arcade games and VR attractions are good. Some of the arcade game were not working though. There was a bit of confusion of where to go to purchase cards and tickets, then to activate them. The food is a bit pricey but decent portions. Now that we have a better understanding of how things work we will be back.

topComments.author: kisha kher
topComments.comment: Do not waste time or money at the arcade games. 80% machine are out of order. When you ask for refund they give you credit to play virtual reality games. Go cart, trampoline and roller skating is much more fun. Don‚Äôt waste money on buying arcade game cards. If you want to save money use Groupon 3 hours prior coming to this location.

topComments.author: Frank
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Quarta vez l√°. Eu realmente adorei. Eu fui para l√° no meu anivers√°rio, foi t√£o divertido dirigir aqueles mini carros. Eu voltarei. A equipe foi muito agrad√°vel.  (Original) Firts time there. I really loved it. I went to there for my birthday, it was so fun driving those mini Cars. I'll come back. The staff was very nice.

topComments.author: Blessed Touch
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Eu me diverti muuuuito estando em Dezerland hoje! Sempre voltarei pela quantidade de divers√£o que sempre me diverti! Fui com meu irm√£o hoje e ambos percebemos que ISTO SER√Å UMA COISA PARA SEMPRE! Obrigado, Equipe do Dezerland! Voc√™ fez um v√≠nculo ficar mais forte üö®üö®  (Original) I had sooooo much FUN being at Dezerland today! I will always come back because the amount of fun i always have! I went with my brother today and we both realized THIS WILL BE A FOREVER THING! Thanks Team at Dezerland ! You made a bond grow stronger üö®üö®

topComments.author: Tristan Neal
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Vou ser honesto, a √∫nica coisa realmente boa sobre este lugar s√£o os karts e as salas de realidade virtual. O fliperama oferece ingressos que voc√™ pode usar para comprar itens de sua loja, como Dave N Busters. Devo dizer que, quando fomos, o arcade tinha literalmente 50% dos jogos fora de ordem, se n√£o mais.  H√° uma m√°quina que diz explicitamente lutador de rua, ent√£o voc√™ esperaria que quando voc√™ passasse seu cart√£o, voc√™ estivesse jogando lutador de rua, certo? Bem, voc√™ estaria errado. Voc√™ est√° jogando um jogo completamente diferente. Isso √© apenas louco cara.  H√° uma mini pista de boliche no fliperama com digamos 5 pistas. Diga-me como havia apenas UMA pista aberta. Vamos agora.  Para ser justo, n√£o experimentamos o curso de corda, parque de trampolim, escalada, curso de ninja, ent√£o n√£o vou comentar sobre isso. Mas se voc√™ est√° apenas procurando um arcade, eu passaria, ou tentaria outra coisa que eles t√™m aqui que n√£o seja o arcade.  (Original) I'm gonna be honest, the only thing really good about this place is the go-karts and the virtual reality rooms.  The arcade gives you tickets that you can use to buy items from their shop, kind of like Dave N Busters. I gotta say though, when we went, the arcade had literally 50% of the games out of order, if not more.  There's a machine that explicitly says street fighter on it, so you'd expect that when you swipe your card, you'll be playing street fighter, right? Well, you'd be wrong. You're playing a completely different game. That's just crazy man.  There's a mini bowling alley in the arcade with let's say 5 lanes. Tell me how there was only ONE lane open. C'mon now.  To be fair, we didn't try the rope course, trampoline park, rock climbing, ninja course, so I'm not commenting on that. But if you're just looking for an arcade, I'd pass , or try something else they have here that's not the arcade.

topComments.author: Estylizt designs
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Minha fam√≠lia adora este lugar, mas as galerias n√£o eram o que esper√°vamos. Tantas outras coisas para fazer para se divertir. Pre√ßo alto por sinal, mas vale a pena assistir as crian√ßas se divertirem muito. ü§ó  (Original) My family loves this place,  but the arcades wasn't what we expected.  So much other things to do for fun though.  High priced by the way, but well worth watching the kids have so much fun. ü§ó

topComments.author: Chrissy V
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Eu gostaria que fosse mais perto da minha casa. N√≥s nos divertimos muito. H√° muito o que ver e fazer. Eu diria que os pre√ßos dos alimentos e bebidas s√£o um pouco rid√≠culos para o que voc√™ recebe.  (Original) I wish it was closer to my house. We had a lot of fun. There's a lot to do and see. I would say the food and drink prices are a little ridiculous for what you get.

topComments.author: Edermar Dominguez
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Os kartings s√£o muito divertidos e s√£o el√©tricos, a √∫nica coisa ruim √© que √†s vezes eles desaceleram e isso √© um pouco frustrante, acho que eles fazem isso quando h√° crian√ßas na pista, por outro lado o Arcade e a realidade virtual os jogos s√£o um pre√ßo bastante bom para a experi√™ncia eu recomendo  (Original) Los kartings muy divertidos y son el√©ctricos lo √∫nico malo es que aveces les reducen la velocidad y eso es un poco frustrante supongo que lo hacen cuando hay ni√±os en la pista, por otro lado el Arcade y los juegos de realidad virtual bastante buen precio por la experiencia lo recomiendo

topComments.author: Jays Play Days
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Este lugar n√£o √© o que √© alardeado. Visitando minha irm√£ pela primeira vez e ela ficou emocionada em nos trazer. Infelizmente, este lugar tem muitos videogames que n√£o funcionam. Depois disso, fomos para a pista. Esper√°vamos algo grande e maravilhoso porque os adultos n√£o podem andar com crian√ßas. Claro que voc√™ pensaria que isso significa que a pista para adultos est√° prestes a ser espetacular. Assim, eles basicamente deixam voc√™ seguir o outro caminho que as crian√ßas fazem. Visite por sua pr√≥pria conta e risco.  (Original) This place is not what it is hyped up to be. Visiting my sister for the first time and she was thrilled to bring us. Unfortunately this place has lots of video games that do not work. After that we went to the track. We expected something big and marvelous because adults can't ride with kids. Of course you would think that means the adult track is about to be spectacular. Sike they basically just let you go the other way Tham the kids do. Visit at your own risk.

topComments.author: lord Cano
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Piscinas frias, US$ 20 por hora. Substituiu o campo de minigolfe. √â sexta-feira e o site diz que fecha √†s 23h, mas eles disseram que terminaram de vender cart√µes de arcade √†s 21h30. Assim que acabou de matar a noite inteira para n√≥s aqui, n√£o voltarei.  (Original) Pools cool, $20 one hour. It replaced the mini golf course. It's Friday and website says 11pm close time but they said they are done selling arcade cards at 930pm. So that just killed the whole night for us here, will not be returning.

topComments.author: Ryan Culhane
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Este lugar √© muito confuso. Chegamos no minuto em que abriu e entramos na entrada do refeit√≥rio e andamos um pouco antes de encontrar um zelador legal que nos disse onde estava tudo. N√≥s finalmente chegamos ao local de kart e eles estavam testando a pista. Tivemos 1 adulto e 2 menores e o pre√ßo de 1 corrida foi algo em torno de $ 145, para uma corrida de 8 minutos. A experi√™ncia real de corrida foi muito divertida. Os karts eram carros el√©tricos muito r√°pidos, em algum lugar na faixa de 70+ mph, e os funcion√°rios eram divertidos. Foi uma boa corrida, √© muito dinheiro, especialmente porque posso obter uma experi√™ncia muito semelhante em casa por muito, muito mais barato. Ficamos com sede e voltamos para o refeit√≥rio, onde entramos, e o caf√© estava fechado. Havia um funcion√°rio parado l√°, ent√£o perguntamos a ele se havia algum lugar onde pud√©ssemos tomar uma bebida e ele disse que n√£o, exceto fontes de √°gua e que voltasse em meia hora para o caf√©. Ent√£o fomos para o curso de cordas e foi divertido, mas uma experi√™ncia muito curta e n√£o havia ningu√©m para supervisionar, exceto um funcion√°rio que nos deu nossas pulseiras e esperava que soub√©ssemos como entrar no curso e ficou bravo quando pedimos . Depois disso, fomos andar de patins e quando perguntei √† senhora da recep√ß√£o se eles tinham patins, ela parecia confusa (sei que isso n√£o tem nada a ver com a hist√≥ria e isso n√£o √© uma reclama√ß√£o, apenas achei engra√ßado). O patins foi divertido, mas n√£o havia absolutamente ningu√©m al√©m de n√≥s o tempo todo e foi uma experi√™ncia muito estranha o tempo todo. O lugar era um conceito legal, mas n√£o havia ningu√©m l√° o tempo todo al√©m de n√≥s neste grande pr√©dio vazio. A maioria dos jogos no fliperama estavam fora de ordem e havia algumas se√ß√µes do pr√©dio que estavam completamente fechadas. Passamos cerca de 3 horas aqui e quase n√£o vimos ningu√©m, mas no geral, o conceito legal √© muito caro e n√£o h√° muito a oferecer.  (Original) This place is very confusing. We came the minute it opened and we walked in the cafeteria entrance and we walked around for a bit before we found a nice janitor who told us where everything was. We eventually made it over to the karting place and they were testing the track. We had 1 Adult and 2 Minors and the price for 1 Race was somewhere around $145, for an 8 minute race. The actual racing experience was very fun. The karts were very fast electric cars, somewhere in the 70+ mph range, and the employees were fun. It was a good race it‚Äôs just a lot of money especially since I can get a very similar experience back home for much, much cheaper. We got thirsty so we went back to the cafeteria, where we entered, and the caf√© was closed. There was an employee standing there so we asked him if there was anywhere we could get a drink and he said no except water fountains and to check back in a half hour for the cafe. So we went to the rope course and that was fun but a very short experience and there was no one to supervise except for the one employee that gave us our wrist bands and expected us to know how to enter the course and got mad when we asked. After that, we went roller skating and when i asked the lady at the desk if they had roller blades she seemed confused (i know this has nothing to do with the story and this isn‚Äôt a complaint i just thought it was funny). The roller blading was fun but there was absolutely no one there besides us the entire time and it was a very eerie experience the entire time. The place was a cool concept but there was just no one there the entire time besides us in this big empty building. Most of the games in the arcade were out-of-order and there were a couple sections of the building which were completely closed. We spent about 3 hours here and hardly saw anyone but overall, cool concept just very pricy and not a lot to offer.

topComments.author: Fernandez Vina
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) COMUNIDADE KOSHER POR FAVOR, ESTEJA ATENTO. Quer√≠amos comemorar o anivers√°rio do meu filho aqui e est√°vamos dispostos a pagar pelo evento privado. O propriet√°rio √© supostamente judeu. Expliquei desde o in√≠cio que somos judeus e observamos e somos kosher e traremos nossa pr√≥pria comida, perguntei se eles oferecem comida kosher eu teria que pedir documenta√ß√£o e mostrar ao meu rabino para ele confirmar se kosher ou n√£o. Bem, eles me disseram que se eu quiser comemorar o anivers√°rio do meu filho l√°, DEVO PAGAR PELA COMIDA N√ÉO KOSHER, MESMO QUE N√ÉO ESTEJA COMENDO. 2022 e ainda estamos vendo essas coisas. Inacredit√°vel.  (Original) KOSHER COMMUNITY PLEASE BE AWARE. We wanted to celebrate my kid's bday here and we were willing to pay for private event. The owner is supposedly Jewish. I explained from the very beginning we are Jews and we observe and we are kosher and we will bring our own food, I asked if they offer kosher food I would have to ask for documentation and show to my rabbi for him to confirm if kosher or not. Well they told me if I want to celebrate my kid bday there I MUST PAY FOR THEIR NON KOSHER FOOD EVEN IF I AM NOT EATING IT. 2022 and we are still see this things. Unbelievable.
